entry.title: 4 Pack | Clear Resin Transparent Chiavari Chair, Armless Stackable Chairs
entry.summary:
Vendor: eFavormart
Type: Furniture
Price: 299.99

[About]

Quantity: 4 Chiavari Chairs
Material: Acrylic | Resin
Color: Clear
Style: Transparent Assembly Chiavari Chair
Weight Capacity: 400lbs

What you get:

  • 4 Chairs
  • Each Chair in 4 Parts + Bag of accessories
    Total Chair Measurement:
    • Total Size: 17"L x 36"H
    • Height (Seat to Top): 19"
    • Height (Seat to Bottom): 17.5"
    • Seat Size: 16"L x 16"W
    UV treated to prevent fading and discoloration
    Scratch and Water Resistant
    Non-Stick and Anti-Static Finish
    Assembly Required: Yes
    Assembly Instruction: Not included. Easy to Assemble
    All sizes are approximate measurements
    Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information]

    Other Measurements:

    Chair Parts:

    • Back: 36"L x 16"
    • Bottom: 17"L x 15"W
    • Legs:
      • Overall Length: 13.25
      • Overall Top/Base Oval Size: 0.75"L x 0.5"W
    • Seat: 16"L x 15"W

    Bag of Parts:

    • (8x) Long Flat-Tipped Screws
      • Length: 1.25"L
      • Top/Bottom Diameter: 1cm | 0.5cm
    • (5x) Short Sharp-Tipped Screws
      • Length: 0.75"
      • Top/Neck Diameter: 0.75cm | 3mm
    • (8x) Screw Covers
      • Diameter Size: 0.5"

    Additional Information:

      • This chair can be stacked up to five chairs high
      • Ideal indoor or outdoor seating solution
      • Transparent, crystal finish and classic chiavari design
      • Lightweight, transparent design is great for special events like weddings or catered events
      • Ships unassembled (easy to assemble)

entry.title: Rose Gold | Blush Universal Satin Chair Cover
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2150
Type: Chair Covers
Price: 2.39 - 668.99 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Chair Cover 
Material: Satin
Color: Rose Gold | Blush
Size: 46" tall x 44" width
Note: Fits Banquet, Folding, and Chiavari style chairs.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Universal Satin Chair Covers

Our supreme quality Satin Universal Chair Covers are fashioned with sublime refinement and extra smoothness to create one of a kind chair decoration for those special events that call for an extra dash of swanky urbanity and a red carpet treatment.

Durable and Classy

These highly durable and classy chair covers to give your special event an elegant look. Pair it with matching satin chair sashes and napkins, satin tablecloths, table skirts, backdrops, aisle runners, chair bows, flowers, and so much more. Adorn with your theme color chair sashes, chair belts, chair caps, and chair ties, rhinestone sashes pins and buckles to give a luxurious look to your otherwise plain and ordinary party chairs.

Multi-Use

Get inspired by these Universal Satin Chair Covers as it adds a class to your simple celebration. Perfect for weddings, showers, anniversaries, sweet 16, quinceanera, birthdays, and other festive celebrations. From the extensive array of colors, you can pick the perfect hue to coordinate with your party theme color.
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration 
  • How to Care: Machine Washable, Tumble Dry, Low Heat

The Premium quality polyester universal chair covers with perfect fitting are durable enough to withstand the heavy duty usage during outdoor carnivals, culinary events, weddings, as well as indoor tea parties, birthdays, and holiday dinners. Plan as many events as you want and invite as many guest as you desire without even worrying about the expenses and your budget. From the extensive array of colors, you can pick the perfect hue to coordinate with your party theme color.

 

Additional Information:

  • How to care: Warm water wash. Low temp dry
